project.name: Geronimo :: JavaMail Implementation
project.shortDescription: These classes represent the Apache implementation of the API of the JavaMail Specification, taken from J2EE 1.4 API documentation and on the JavaMail 1.3 specification PDF.
project.description: The JavaMail API allows programs to send mail messages and to be able to interrogate a remote mail store (e.g. POP/IMAP inbox) for the message location. This provides only the implementation of the API; there are no API classes (you may use the Sun RI, or the geronimo-spec-javamail ones).
